column1: It’s been half a year since we passed COVID relief. We’re seeing lines for food around the block. 30 million Americans are at risk of eviction. Republicans continue to do nothing. Does anyone else feel like they’re going crazy? https://t.co/Bl1CT87BhO

Dems across the country are fighting for COVID relief better wages health care and protections for working people. We’re fighting to give everyday families a fair shot.  That’s what this party stands for. We must do better getting that message across. https://t.co/m5w7UAcABC
